```{css, echo=FALSE}
#title-block-header .title {
    display: none;
}
```

```{css echo=FALSE}
.embed-container {
    position: relative;
    padding-bottom: 129%;
    height: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    max-width: 100%;
    margin-top: 0px;
}

.embed-container iframe,
.embed-container object,
.embed-container embed {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
```

```{=html}


<div class="embed-container">
  <iframe src="`r rmarkdown::metadata$cv$pdf`" style="border: 0.5px"></iframe>
</div>
```
